title: Lufia I - Soundtrack (Gamerip) OST (EliXiR) mp3
description:
Game: Lufia & The Fortress of Doom
Platform: SNES
Genre: RPG
Year: 1993

Composer: Yasunori Shiono


ATTENTION: This is a GAMERIP not an official soundtrack (becasuse there never was one, although there is a 4 Disc Lufia OST) there is no track listing or real song names, simply Town or Castle
